decision_conditions: Reason : 1 - The applicant has failed to provide consistent information on the application form and elevations in relation to the depth, maximum height, and eaves height of the proposed development and therefore has failed to provide consistent information required by condition A.4(2) (a) and 3(b) permitted by Class A of Part 1 (to Schedule 2) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

Reason : 2 - The applicant has failed to provide accurate plans which include a correct scale bar or plan numbers and therefore has failed to provide consistent information required by condition A.4(2) (b) of development permitted by Class A of Part 1 (to Schedule 2) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.

Reason : 3 - The proposed rear extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse. The proposal would therefore fail to meet Condition A.1.(j)(iii) of Class A to Part 1 (Schedule 2) of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended.
